name: Minute (regularGAMES)
description:
Description:

Complete each level by timing the arrow to hit the red area on the slider. If you do, you jump on to the next platform! But if you don't, something bad will reach your way...

Instructions: 

Use space bar to stop the arrow and jump.

If you want to play the game how it is on scratch then go to https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/643099796/

All Updates so far:

Test Pre Alpha - Getting the basic coding out of the way and adding the menu screen.

Alpha- First level finished and added.

Beta- Second level added and now released to the public.

Made by regularGAMES.

2022
